      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Subject PasswordAuthenticator.authenticate(String domain, String userName, char[] password, PasswordValidator passwordValidator)
      Authenticate a user by validating the user's password, returning a Subject with one or more Principals set (if validation was successful), or throw a LoginException (if validation fails)
